title: Trump Is Pro-Vaxx, GoopAnon 8.24.21
itunes:title: Trump Is Pro-Vaxx, GoopAnon 8.24.21
description:
In episode 975, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Pod Yourself A Gun co-host Matt Lieb to discuss covid vaccinations, Trump being booed at his rally, the milk crate challenge, the Goop cruise, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. LIVE TDZ SHOW TICKETS!
  2. NYC, N.J. Mandate Teacher Shots; U.S. Deaths Climb: Virus Update
  3. States gripped by Delta variant face case surge with fewer health workers
  4. Covid-19 Updates: F.D.A. Grants Full Approval to Pfizer-BioNTech Covid Vaccine
  5. Happy day for me. Several people I care a lot about got the COVID vaccine today, overcoming some hesitancy. What do I say to my patients who are unsure about the vaccine? This:
  6. Trump Rally-Goers Lose Their Minds When Rep. Mo Brooks Tells Them to Move Past 2020 Election
  7. Trump Booed at His Own Rally for Telling His Supporters to Get Vaccinated
  8. Trump Booed At Own Rally, Some Supporters Think He Did It On Purpose
  9. The ‘Milk Crate Challenge’ is turning the entire world into ‘Jackass’ stars
  10. The Gwyneth Paltrow-Approved Doctor Pushing Wacky Coronavirus Conspiracies
  11. GP’s Picks: Healing My Body with a Longer-Term Detox
  12. It took a year, but Gwyneth Paltrow figured out how to exploit the pandemic
  13. Gwyneth Paltrow Reveals She Has “Long-Haul” COVID. Here’s What She Wants To Sell You
  14. Gwyneth Paltrow Responds to COVID-Remedy Criticism: “That Becomes Clickbait”
  15. Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop Cruise is ready to set sail
  16. Gwyneth Paltrow's Goop Cruises Are Officially Setting Sail This October
  17. Batten Down Your Hatches, the Goop Cruise Is Back
  18. CDC recommends travelers with high risk of Covid complications avoid cruises
  19. LISTEN: Genevieve Artadi - 'Living Like I Know I’m Gonna Die' (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
